original: @271b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @271b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: shr'i ma h'a k'a la de w'i sto tra aashta n'a ma /
analyzed: shr'i ma h'a k'a la de w'i sto tra aashta n'a ma /
translated: Shri Mahakaaladevi Stotra Ashta Nama

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: dpal lha mo nag mo chen mol bstod pa brgyad pa zhes bya ba /
analyzed: dpal lha mo nag mo chen mol bstod pa brgyad pa zhes bya ba /
translated: The Eight-Line Praise to Glorious Great Black Goddess

original: dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to glorious Vajrapani.

original: til mar gyis bskus lan bu gcig pa ro nye'i rna chas sgeg cing cha lugs ma lus 'chang //
analyzed: til mar gyis bskus lan bu gcig pa ro nye'i rna chas sgeg cing cha lugs ma lus 'chang //
translated: Obeisance to you, the great goddess, who is smeared with sesame oil, has a single braid, wears earrings of raw flesh, and maintains all aspects of attire.

original: rgyan du rkang sgrogs lcags las byas pa cig gis rang gi rkang pa mdzes par byas pa de //
analyzed: rgyan du rkang sgrogs lcags las byas pa cig gis rang gi rkang pa mdzes par byas pa de //
translated: Adorned with a single anklet made of iron, beautifying your feet,

original: gcer bu bong bu zhon zhing 'gro ba 'di na rgyu ba de ni lha mo khyod nyid kyis //
analyzed: gcer bu bong bu zhon zhing 'gro ba 'di na rgyu ba de ni lha mo khyod nyid kyis //
translated: you ride a donkey, naked, wandering here. This is you, the goddess.

original: bdag nyid mdzes par shes kyis gzhan ltas khyod kyi spyod pa'i mtsho chen don dag su yis shes //
analyzed: bdag nyid mdzes par shes kyis gzhan ltas khyod kyi spyod pa'i mtsho chen don dag su yis shes //
translated: Knowing your own beauty, who else knows the great ocean of your conduct?

original: 'khor ba 'jig pa'i tshe na mi lus ngag las khrag dang zhag 'dzag dud pa 'thul ba na //
analyzed: 'khor ba 'jig pa'i tshe na mi lus ngag las khrag dang zhag 'dzag dud pa 'thul ba na //
translated: When the world is destroyed, human bodies emit blood, fat, and smoke from their speech.

original: lha mo mche ba mi bzang khyod kyis zhal du 'gro kun skad cig tsam gyis zhugs par 'gyur //
analyzed: lha mo mche ba mi bzang khyod kyis zhal du 'gro kun skad cig tsam gyis zhugs par 'gyur //
translated: You, goddess with the terrible fangs, in an instant you enter the mouths of all beings.

original: nag mo mi thod thogs pa khyod ni rnal 'byor grub pa'i rnal 'byor can te dur khrod dgyes //
analyzed: nag mo mi thod thogs pa khyod ni rnal 'byor grub pa'i rnal 'byor can te dur khrod dgyes //
translated: You, black one, holding a human skull, you are a yoginÄ« of accomplished yoga, you delight in the charnel ground.

original: khyod ni g-yo byed mnan cing nad chen 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa bsal zhing mi bzad dril yang sgrogs //
analyzed: khyod ni g-yo byed mnan cing nad chen 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa bsal zhing mi bzad dril yang sgrogs //
translated: You suppress the deceiver, and dispel the fear of great illness and death, and you also ring the terrible bell.

original: khyod ni dpa' bo dag gi mgo bos cod pan gyis ni legs sbas g-yul du mtshon gyis bcad pa yi //
analyzed: khyod ni dpa' bo dag gi mgo bos cod pan gyis ni legs sbas g-yul du mtshon gyis bcad pa yi //
translated: You, with the head of the heroes, well-hidden with a diadem, in battle, cut down with a sword,

original: phreng ba thogs shing gar byed lag pa mnyen brkyang rkub tshos che la klu @272a * //
analyzed: phreng ba thogs shing gar byed lag pa mnyen brkyang rkub tshos che la klu @272a * //
translated: wearing a garland, dancing, with soft outstretched arms, with large buttocks, with a serpent

original: dbang gshibs pa yi //
analyzed: dbang gshibs pa yi //
translated: king entwined,

original: ska rags 'ching zhing lag na mdung dang ral gri thogs la khrag gi chang gis myos par 'gyur //
analyzed: ska rags 'ching zhing lag na mdung dang ral gri thogs la khrag gi chang gis myos par 'gyur //
translated: binding a belt, holding a spear and sword in your hand, you are intoxicated with the wine of blood.

original: mig rtsa dmar por gyur cing mtshan mo dur khrod 'gro ba 'byung po phal chen rnams kyis mthong //
analyzed: mig rtsa dmar por gyur cing mtshan mo dur khrod 'gro ba 'byung po phal chen rnams kyis mthong //
translated: With reddened eyes, you go to the charnel ground at night, seen by the multitude of bhÅ«tas.

original: ko rlon chen po dral te brkyangs pa'i gos kyis man pas shing phyed g-yogs phyed ni re ldes dkris //
analyzed: ko rlon chen po dral te brkyangs pa'i gos kyis man pas shing phyed g-yogs phyed ni re ldes dkris //
translated: With a great elephant hide stretched out and covering half the tree, the other half wrapped in iron.

original: mi yi rgyu ma gsar pa'i sbubs kyis zhal gyi zla ba brgyan cing dril bu 'gram par 'khrol //
analyzed: mi yi rgyu ma gsar pa'i sbubs kyis zhal gyi zla ba brgyan cing dril bu 'gram par 'khrol //
translated: The moon of his face is adorned with a fresh human entrail, and a bell tinkles at his cheek.

original: lus ni snum gyis gsar du byugs shing khrag dang zhag la sogs pa'i thig les tshom bur bris //
analyzed: lus ni snum gyis gsar du byugs shing khrag dang zhag la sogs pa'i thig les tshom bur bris //
translated: His body is freshly anointed with oil, and is marked with drops of blood, fat, and so on.ðŸ”½May the skull-bearer protect me, who chews human flesh with his teeth!

original: mi yi sha la so yis chem chem gcod byed thod pa can ni bdag la skyong gyur cig / drag po drag mo mi bzad mi sha kha na thogs pa sngon chad ma byung khyod mthong nas //
analyzed: mi yi sha la so yis chem chem gcod byed thod pa can ni bdag la skyong gyur cig / drag po drag mo mi bzad mi sha kha na thogs pa sngon chad ma byung khyod mthong nas //
translated: Seeing you, O fierce one, fierce lady, unbearable, eating human flesh, unheard of,

original: ma mo rnams kyang skrag cing brtabs la rngam pa 'thon cing mig rtsa rig rig khyod la 'dud //
analyzed: ma mo rnams kyang skrag cing brtabs la rngam pa 'thon cing mig rtsa rig rig khyod la 'dud //
translated: even the mamos are frightened, terrified, and alarmed, their eyes bulging, they bow to you.

original: nag mo bzang mo lus mdog gnag cing bzod par dka' ba khyod la brgya byin la sogs kyang //
analyzed: nag mo bzang mo lus mdog gnag cing bzod par dka' ba khyod la brgya byin la sogs kyang //
translated: O black lady, with a black body, difficult to bear, even Indra and the others

original: nyin gcig bzhin du bstod pa byed de gshin rje nyid kyang rtag tu 'dar zhing 'dud par byed //
analyzed: nyin gcig bzhin du bstod pa byed de gshin rje nyid kyang rtag tu 'dar zhing 'dud par byed //
translated: And every day he praises thee: even Yama ever quakes and bows before thee.

original: mi rnams dang ni 'gro ba ma lus pa dag mjug brtul ba ni rna ba ya gcig la //
analyzed: mi rnams dang ni 'gro ba ma lus pa dag mjug brtul ba ni rna ba ya gcig la //
translated: Thou hast subdued all men and all creatures, and with one ear

original: brang gis 'gro ba 'go bo'i gdengs ka stong dang ldan ba rgyab nas rgyan du byas nas gnas //ðŸ”½ya gcig la ni seng ge mtshungs med thogs shing rgya mtshos bskor ba'i sa gzhi ma lus gnon //
analyzed: brang gis 'gro ba 'go bo'i gdengs ka stong dang ldan ba rgyab nas rgyan du byas nas gnas // ya gcig la ni seng ge mtshungs med thogs shing rgya mtshos bskor ba'i sa gzhi ma lus gnon //
translated: Thou walkest on thy breast, and with a thousand hoods art decked behind.ðŸ”½With the other ear thou bearest a peerless lion, and dost tread down the whole earth girt by the ocean.

original: steng na rgyu ba'i nyi ma 'od zer stong ldan khyod kyi lte ba'i thad ka'i phyogs su gzhag / rgya mtsho'i klong nas me 'bar khyod //
analyzed: steng na rgyu ba'i nyi ma 'od zer stong ldan khyod kyi lte ba'i thad ka'i phyogs su gzhag / rgya mtsho'i klong nas me 'bar khyod //
translated: The sun, that moves above, with his thousand rays, is placed by thee upon thy navel.

original: chu rnams skems par nus pa ste //
analyzed: chu rnams skems par nus pa ste //
translated: Thou art able to dry up the waters of the sea,

original: bud med thams cad zhi bya'i phyir //
analyzed: bud med thams cad zhi bya'i phyir //
translated: And to appease all women.

original: lha chen sku yi phyed du bzhag / rdzong dang dka' zlog nag mo che //
analyzed: lha chen sku yi phyed du bzhag / rdzong dang dka' zlog nag mo che //
translated: Half of the body of the great god is thine,

original: lha dang lha min phyag byas pa //
analyzed: lha dang lha min phyag byas pa //
translated: And thou art worshipped by the gods and Asuras.

original: mi nad gang yin khyod kyis shes //
analyzed: mi nad gang yin khyod kyis shes //
translated: Thou knowest all the diseases of men.

original: de ni 'jigs pa med par mdzod //
analyzed: de ni 'jigs pa med par mdzod //
translated: You are the one who should be relied upon by all.ðŸ”½You are the one who should be served by all.ðŸ”½You are the one who should be honored by all.ðŸ”½You are the one who should be praised by all.ðŸ”½You are the one who should be worshipped by all.ðŸ”½You are the one who should be praised by all.ðŸ”½You are the one who should be offered to by all.ðŸ”½You are the one who should be relied upon by all.

original: gshin rje'i lcam mo bdud kyi yum //
analyzed: gshin rje'i lcam mo bdud kyi yum //
translated: You are the one who should be served by all.ðŸ”½You are the one who should be honored by all.ðŸ”½You are the one who should be praised by all.ðŸ”½You are the one who should be worshipped by all.

original: 'dod khams dbang phyug ma la bstod //
analyzed: 'dod khams dbang phyug ma la bstod //
translated: You are the one who should be praised by all.ðŸ”½You are the one who should be offered to by all.ðŸ”½You are the one who should be relied upon by all.ðŸ”½You are the one who should be served by all.ðŸ”½You are the one who should be honored by all.ðŸ”½You are the one who should be praised by all.ðŸ”½You are the one who should be worshipped by all.ðŸ”½You are the one who should be praised by all.ðŸ”½You are the one who should be offered to by all.ðŸ”½You are the one who should be relied upon by all.ðŸ”½You are the one who should be served by all.ðŸ”½You are the one who should be honored by all.ðŸ”½You are the one who should be praised by all.ðŸ”½You are the one who should be worshipped by all.ðŸ”½You are the one who should be praised by all.ðŸ”½You are the one who should be offered to by all.ðŸ”½You are the one who should be relied upon by all.ðŸ”½You are the one who should be served by all.ðŸ”½You are the one who should be honored by all.ðŸ”½You are the one who should be praised by all.ðŸ”½You are the one who should be worshipped by all.ðŸ”½You are the one who should be praised by all.ðŸ”½You are the one who should be offered to by all.ðŸ”½You are the one who should be relied upon by all.

original: nad do cog gi bdag mo dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo la bstod pa brgyad pa zhes bya ba bram ze mchog sred kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: nad do cog gi bdag mo dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo la bstod pa brgyad pa zhes bya ba bram ze mchog sred kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
